title: Who Is The Left’s Real Enemy? (Ep 1718)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning similarities from the liberal war on free speech, to the Putin war on “fake news.” I also address the fallout from a disturbing study about the Pfizer COVID vaccine. 

News Picks:

As always, the totalitarian American-left is using a crisis to crush dissent.

There’s another COVID variant emerging.

The big tech tyrants are terrified of the latest vaccine study.


Biden lied, again, about the Trump tax cuts.

NY is pushing a ridiculously expensive government healthcare program.
